code: @Manual{,   title = {scVisual: Single-cell Visualization Toolkit},   author = {Fruit Mix},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.2}, }

title: Single-cell Visualization Toolkit
code: install.packages('devtools')  devtools::install_github('junjunlab/jjAnno')  devtools::install_github('junjunlab/jjPlot')  devtools::install_github("jokergoo/ComplexHeatmap")  devtools::install_github('linzhengmix/scVisual')  # if not install ggunchull devtools::install_github("sajuukLyu/ggunchull", type = "source")  library(scVisual)

title: Single-cell Visualization Toolkit
code:
library(scVisual)  # load test data test <- system.file("extdata", "seuratTest.RDS", package = "scVisual") tmp <- readRDS(test)   # umap clusterCornerAxes(object = tmp,reduction = 'umap',                   noSplit = T)  # facet by metadata column "orig.ident" clusterCornerAxes(object = tmp,                   reduction = 'umap',                   noSplit = F,                   groupFacet = 'orig.ident',                   aspect.ratio = 1,                   relLength = 0.5)  # retain only one axes clusterCornerAxes(object = tmp,                   reduction = 'umap',                   noSplit = F,                   groupFacet = 'orig.ident',                   aspect.ratio = 1,                   relLength = 0.5,                   axes = 'one')   # 在调用函数前确保数据干净 prepare_clean_data <- function(seurat_obj, group_column = "orig.ident") {   # 1. 获取原始数据   col_data <- seurat_obj@meta.data[[group_column]]    # 2. 检查并清理问题值   # 替换NA值   if (any(is.na(col_data))) {     cat("发现NA值，将替换为'Unknown'
")     col_data[is.na(col_data)] <- "Unknown"   }    # 替换空字符串   if (any(col_data == "")) {     cat("发现空字符串，将替换为'Unknown'
")     col_data[col_data == ""] <- "Unknown"   }    # 3. 获取有效的唯一值   unique_vals <- unique(col_data)   unique_vals <- unique_vals[unique_vals != "" & !is.na(unique_vals)]    if (length(unique_vals) == 0) {     stop("没有有效的分组值")   }    # 4. 创建因子   seurat_obj@meta.data[[group_column]] <- factor(col_data, levels = unique_vals)    cat("清理完成，因子水平:", paste(levels(seurat_obj@meta.data[[group_column]]), collapse = ", "), "
")    return(seurat_obj) }  # 使用清理后的数据 tmp_clean <- prepare_clean_data(tmp, "orig.ident")  # 现在调用函数 clusterCornerAxes(object = tmp_clean,                   reduction = 'umap',                   noSplit = FALSE,                   groupFacet = 'orig.ident',                   aspect.ratio = 1,                   relLength = 0.5,                   axes = 'one')    # 自定义输出顺序 tmp$orig.ident <- factor(tmp$orig.ident,                          levels = c("ST2", "ST1", "ST3", "ST4"))  clusterCornerAxes(object = tmp,                   reduction = 'umap',                   noSplit = F,                   groupFacet = 'orig.ident',                   aspect.ratio = 1,                   relLength = 0.5,                   axes = 'one')

what: Plot averaged gene expression cross cluster cells — averageHeatmap
title: Plot averaged gene expression cross cluster cells — averageHeatmap
text: Plot averaged gene expression cross cluster cells

title: Plot averaged gene expression cross cluster cells — averageHeatmap
code: averageHeatmap(   object = NULL,   markerGene = NULL,   group.by = "ident",   assays = "RNA",   slot = "data",   htCol = c("#0099CC", "white", "#CC0033"),   colseed = 666,   htRange = c(-2, 0, 2),   annoCol = FALSE,   myanCol = NULL,   annoColType = "light",   annoColTypeAlpha = 0,   row_title = "Cluster top Marker genes",   row_names_side = "left",   border = FALSE,   fontsize = 10,   column_names_rot = 45,   showRowNames = TRUE,   markGenes = NULL,   clusterAnnoName = TRUE,   width = NULL,   height = NULL,   cluster.order = NULL,   cluster_columns = FALSE,   cluster_rows = FALSE,   gene.order = NULL,   ... )

title: Plot averaged gene expression cross cluster cells — averageHeatmap
text: object object seurat object. markerGene marker genes. group.Categories grouping (e.g, ident, replicate, celltype). "ident" default. assays assays use. Default "RNA" assays. slot Slot(s) use. Default "data". htCol Heatmap colors. Default c("#0099CC", "white", "#CC0033"). colseed Cluster annotation colors seed, colors produced randomly, can give seed assure produce colors.  Default 666. htRange Heatmap values range. Default c(-2, 0, 2). annoCol Whether use annotation clusters colors. Default "FALSE". myanCol can specify annotation clusters colors vectors. Default "null". annoColType Cluster annotation colors type (bright, light, dark random). Default light. annoColTypeAlpha Cluster annotation colors transparency. Default 0. row_title Heatmap row title. Default "Cluster top Marker genes". row_names_side Heatmap gene name side. Default "left". border Whether shOw heatmap border. Default "FALSE". fontsize Heatmap gene name fontsize. Default 10. column_names_rot Cluster name rotation. Default 45. showRowNames whether show rownames. Default "TRUE". markGenes Provide target genes mark plot. Default "NULL". clusterAnnoName Whether add clsuetr column annotation name. Default "TRUE". width heatmap body width. Default "NULL". height heatmap body height. Default "NULL". cluster.order cell clusters order. Default "NULL". cluster_columns Whether cluster columns. Default "FALSE". cluster_rows Whether cluster rows. Default "FALSE". gene.order gene orders heatmap. Default "NULL". ... arguments passed ComplexHeatmap::rowAnnotation ComplexHeatmap::Heatmap.

title: Plot averaged gene expression cross cluster cells — averageHeatmap

title: Plot averaged gene expression cross cluster cells — averageHeatmap
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ httest <- system.file("extdata", "htdata.RDS", package = "scVisual") pbmc <- readRDS(httest)  # load markergene markergene <- system.file("extdata", "top5pbmc.markers.csv", package = "scVisual") markers <- read.table(markergene, sep = ",", header = TRUE)  # plot averageHeatmap(   object = pbmc,   markerGene = markers$gene )  # change color averageHeatmap(   object = pbmc,   markerGene = markers$gene,   htCol = c("#339933", "#FFCC00", "#FF0033") ) } # }

what: Add corner axes on seurat UMAP/tSNE cluster figures — clusterCornerAxes
title: Add corner axes on seurat UMAP/tSNE cluster figures — clusterCornerAxes
text: Add corner axes seurat UMAP/tSNE cluster figures

title: Add corner axes on seurat UMAP/tSNE cluster figures — clusterCornerAxes
text: object seurat object. reduction "string", reduction type (umap/tsne). group_facet "string", give column name seurat metadata facet plot. cluster_col "string", point color group ,cluster name, default "seurat_clusters". p_size "num", point size. aspect_ratio "num", plot width height ratio, default NULL. no_split "logic", whether split/facet plot, default "TRUE". nrow "num", rows plot no_split = FALSE. rel_length "num", corner axis line relative length plot axis(0-1). rel_dist "num" ,relative distance corner axis label axis. axes "string", show multiple corner axis one (mul/one), default "mul". legend_pos "string", legend position ggplot theme function, default "right". key_size legned point size, default 5. line_text_col "string", corner line label color, default "black". strip_col "string", facet background color, default "white". arrow_type "string", arrow type (open/closed), default "closed". corner_text_size "num", corner label text size, default 3. base_size "num", theme base size, default 14. theme_bg Another theme style, default "default", "bwCorner". add_circle "logic", whether add circle clusters, default "FALSE". add_circle_legacy "logic", using legacy version add circle, parameters `nbin`, `nsm`, `addsm`, `sfac` `qval` applicable legacy, default "FALSE". cic_alpha "num", circle fill color alpha, default 0.1. cic_delta "num", distance extend curve (circle), parameter takes effect `add_circle_legacy = FALSE`. cic_line_size "num", circle line size, default 1. cic_line_color "num", circle line color, default "grey50". cic_line_lty "num", circle line type, default "dashed". nbin "num", number points used shape hull, default 100. nsm "num", number points used perform convolution, less nbin, default 10. addsm "num", number additional times convolution performed, default 1. qval "num", expansion size factor, larger value means bigger hull, default 1.5. sfac "num", quantile sector, used determine edge hull, less 1, default 1.5. cell_label Whether label cell type plot, default FALSE. cell_label_size Cell type label size, default 6. cell_label_color Cell type label color, default "black". show_legend Whether show legend, default TRUE. corner_variable group corner axis added "axes" set "one", default first level.

title: Add corner axes on seurat UMAP/tSNE cluster figures — clusterCornerAxes

title: Add corner axes on seurat UMAP/tSNE cluster figures — clusterCornerAxes
code: if (FALSE) test <- system.file("extdata", "seuratTest.RDS", package = "scVisual")  tmp <- readRDS(test) #> Error: object 'test' not found  # umap clusterCornerAxes(   object = tmp, reduction = "umap",   no_split = TRUE ) #> Error: object 'tmp' not found  # arrowType clusterCornerAxes(   object = tmp, reduction = "umap",   no_split = TRUE, arrow_type = "open" ) #> Error: object 'tmp' not found  # facet by metadata column "orig.ident" clusterCornerAxes(   object = tmp, reduction = "umap",   no_split = FALSE, group_facet = "orig.ident",   rel_length = 0.5 ) #> Error: object 'tmp' not found  # retain only one axes with factor ordering tmp$orig.ident <- factor(tmp$orig.ident, levels = c("ST2", "ST3", "ST1", "ST4")) #> Error: object 'tmp' not found clusterCornerAxes(   object = tmp, reduction = "umap",   no_split = FALSE, group_facet = "orig.ident",   rel_length = 0.5,   axes = "one" ) #> Error: object 'tmp' not found  # line color clusterCornerAxes(   object = tmp, reduction = "umap",   no_split = FALSE, group_facet = "orig.ident",   rel_length = 0.5,   line_text_col = "grey50" ) #> Error: object 'tmp' not found  # tsne clusterCornerAxes(   object = tmp, reduction = "tsne",   no_split = FALSE, group_facet = "orig.ident",   rel_length = 0.5 ) #> Error: object 'tmp' not found  # \dontrun{}

text: object object seurat object. reduction "string", reduction type (umap/tsne). features "string", gene want plot. group_facet "string", give column name seurat metadata facet plot, "NULL", facet plot gene. rel_length "num", corner axis line relative length plot axis(0-1). rel_dist "num", relative distance corner axis label axis. aspect_ratio "num", plot width height ratio, default NULL. low "string", point color low expression. high "string", point color high expression. axes "string", show multiple corner axis one (mul/one), default "mul". legend_pos "string", legend position ggplot theme function, default "right". strip_col "string", facet background color, defaults "white". p_size "num", point size. arrow_type "string", arrow type (open/closed), default "closed". line_text_col "string", facet background color, default "white". corner_text_size "num", corner label text size, default 5. base_size "num", theme base size, default 14. theme_bg Another theme style, default "default", "bwCorner". show.legend Whether show legend, default "TRUE". cornerVariable group corner axis added "axes" set "one", default first group. n_layout = NULL Similar ncol/nrow layout, default gene numbers. min_exp Minimum expression value defined, default NULL. max_exp Maxmum expression value defined, default NULL.

code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{  test <- system.file("extdata", "seuratTest.RDS", package = "scVisual")  tmp <- readRDS(test)  # umap featureCornerAxes(   object = tmp, reduction = "umap",   group_facet = "orig.ident",   rel_length = 0.5, rel_dist = 0.2,   features = c("Actb", "Ythdc1", "Ythdf2") )  # one axes with factor ordering tmp$orig.ident <- factor(tmp$orig.ident, levels = c("ST2", "ST3", "ST1", "ST4")) featureCornerAxes(   object = tmp, reduction = "umap",   group_facet = "orig.ident",   features = c("Actb", "Ythdc1", "Ythdf2"),   rel_length = 0.5, rel_dist = 0.2,   axes = "one",   line_text_col = "grey50" )  # tsne featureCornerAxes(   object = tmp, reduction = "tsne",   group_facet = "orig.ident",   rel_length = 0.5, rel_dist = 0.2,   features = c("Actb", "Ythdc1", "Ythdf2") )  } # }

what: This function creates a scatter plot for multiple genes or features from a Seurat object. — featurePlot
title: This function creates a scatter plot for multiple genes or features from a Seurat object. — featurePlot
text: function creates scatter plot multiple genes features Seurat object.

title: This function creates a scatter plot for multiple genes or features from a Seurat object. — featurePlot
text: object Seurat object containing data. reduction dimension use plotting, default "umap". genes character vector gene names feature names plotted. nrow Number rows plot grid. ncol Number columns plot grid. quantile.val quantile value determine color cutoff gene. color vector colors used plotting, defaults predefined set colors. rm_axis Logical value indicating whether remove axis labels ticks, defaults FALSE. rm_legend Logical value indicating whether remove color legend, defaults FALSE. add_rect Logical value indicating whether add rectangle around plot panel, defaults FALSE. add_cor_arrow Logical value indicating whether add arrows indicating correlation direction, defaults FALSE. add_strip Logical value indicating whether add strip top plot panel, defaults FALSE. cor_label_dist Distance corner arrows axis labels. arrow_len Length corner arrows. arrow_label_size Font size corner arrow labels. plot_size Size individual scatter plot. keep_one_cor Logical value indicating whether keep one set corner arrows across entire plot grid, defaults FALSE. xlab Label x-axis. ylab Label y-axis. respect Logical value indicating whether respect specified number rows columns plot grid, defaults TRUE. point_size point size, default 1.

title: This function creates a scatter plot for multiple genes or features from a Seurat object. — featurePlot
text: mixfruit
